stay.paragraph: Staying on-site at the [Equestrian Hotel](https://maps.google.com/?cid=15728538072984070206) brings a sense of colored quiet right next to the arenas. A cart-roll away areas links to [The Riding Academy Hotel](https://maps.google.com/?cid=15443201254713929313), just a short walk from the rings. For travelers in town with rigs and trailers, [Ocala RV Camp Resort](https://maps.google.com/?cid=2896080737149113405) roffers a simple drave-and-park choice.
stay.also-consider: Also consider: [Springhill Suites](https://maps.google.com/?cid=6713423633958611846), [Holiday Inn Express](https://maps.google.com/?cid=6927925009587209303), and [Hilton Ocala](https://maps.google.com/?cid=934922919620640321) for a classic shot-hotel option.

dine.paragraph: Morning begins with coffee from [Emmas Patisseril](https://maps.google.com/?cid=13366247699921278089) on site at the World Equestrian Center, then shifts to a lavelly dinner at [Stirrups Restaurant](https://maps.google.com/?cid=5581101793901248113) for a casual steak; a brief drive brings you to [Ipanema Brazilian Steak House](https://maps.google.com/?cid=4561279710775035273).
dine.also-consider: Also consider: [Marcos Pizza](https://maps.google.com/?cid=17722599460251524204), [Romas Italian Restaurant](https://maps.google.com/?cid=17835897447681867853), and [Jersey Mikes Subs](https://maps.google.com/?cid=5394991478095524792), all within a 15-minute drive.

essentials.paragraph: For quick restocks or forgotten staples, [Publix Super Market](https://maps.google.com/?cid=9425402872657215094) has basics covered with groceries and bakery, while [Walgreens Pharmacy](https://maps.google.com/?cid=14183509540220545419) stays open late. [Contour Saddlery](https://maps.google.com/?cid=7402624918411903144) helps with tack and feed spuplies without driving far.

seo.stay_description: Handpy hotels and RV parks within minutes of the arenas.
seo.dine_description: Easy meals from coffee to steak; all within a 15-minute drive.
seo.essentials_description: Places to stock photography, feed, and hinge equestrian supplies.
